description:
Your average hero's sword that a hero must wield
before going out on an adventure.
name: Sword

description:
Heavy handed weapon that deals a lot of damage, but
the user becomes slower as a result.
name: Axe

description:
Not great for physical attacks, but has magical
power!
name: Cane

description:
Your average bow. It stands no different than a sword
around these parts.
name: Bow

description: A shorter bladed weapon that increases your agility.
name: Dagger
